questions.question: The main idea can be USUALLY be found in the first or last sentence. True or False
Another word for the subject of a passage is the topic. True or False
The main idea of the text is....

choices.answer: What the passage is mostly about.
Made up of a few of the details in the passage.
What the author is trying to say or prove about the topic.

questions.question: What is the subject of a text?

choices.answer: All the supporting details put together.
The narrow topic of a text.
The broad thing the text is about.

questions.question: Another word for Main Idea is....

choices.answer: There is no other word, it's just called main idea

questions.question: About how many supporting details should you look for to justify the main idea?
The broad thing a book is about is called the
Which of the following is an example of the subject of a book?

choices.answer: Dolphins can communicate with one another.
Whistling is one way that dolphins talk to each other.
Have you ever heard a dolphin?

questions.question: Which question would be MOST helpful for figuring out the main idea of a book?

choices.answer: What is the main thing the author wants to say?
What else do I know about the subject?

questions.question: "Plants need sunlight to grow." Which of these is the best supporting detail?

choices.answer: My favorite kind of plant is the Venus fly trap.
Plants that get sunlight grow taller than those who don't
There are many different species of plants on the Earth.
Jessica sat in the sun and looked at her garden.

questions.question: If the main idea of a passage is a table top, then the legs of the table represent the what?
The implied main idea is NOT DIRECTLY STATED in the passage, but is evident from the .....
Typically the STATED main idea will be in which sentence(s) within the text?
Which question below is asking you to find the main idea of a text?

choices.answer: Which sentence from the passage supports the idea that...?
You can tell by the author's tone that the theme is....
Where in the text is the idea located?
Which of the following words mean....?

questions.question: Descriptions of people, places or things that support the main idea are called......
Labor Day has been celebrated for over 100 years. Which is the best main idea?

choices.answer: Soon, Labor Day parades became a yearly event.
Labor Day seems like a fun holiday.
Labor Day is an important National holiday.
Every year, Labor Day is celebrated.
